oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Catalogue of valuable paintings ... : comprising fine examples of the best American artists Durand, Huntington, Kensett, Baker, James M. Hart, Church, Boughton, S.R. Gifford, E. Johnson, Casilear, William T. Richards, Whittredge, Gray, Hubbard, Weir, Shattuck, Darley, etc., with several important illustrations of foreign art one of the finest ever painted by Carl Hubner, and others by Lambert, Beranger, Plassan, Baron Worms, Navier, Bosch, Lemmens, Soyer, Harveng, Beaumont, Von Seben, St. Pierre, Artz, De Buel, Weisz, Pecrus, Meyer Von Bremen
